title: Salud y Vida
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers typical Peruvian foods with many vegan options. Set menu lunches ($2-$2.50) always have a vegan choice. Set menu lunches come with a bowl of soup, main dish, juice or tea and yogurt for dessert. You may ask for any of the plates a-la-carte to be vegan, but not the set menu meals. Note from happycow: if you confirm it is a vegetarian restaurant, please contact us. Thanks.
